title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2014 - Graz, Austria
description:
Infonova (https://www.infonova.com/) and CAMPUS 02 (http://www.campus02.at/) are glad to announce a Global Day of Coderetreat event in Graz. 
Participation is free but there is a limited number of participants - so please register early (http://www.campus02.at/DE/Studieng%C3%A4nge/Informationstechnologien%20%20Wi5/Events/Code+Retreat.aspx)! 
Date: Sa. 15.11.2014, 9:00-17:00 
Schedule: 
 
 9:00-9:30 Welcome Coffee + Introduction 
 9:30-12:30 Coding Sessions 
 12:30-13:15 Lunch break including free lunch (register in time (http://www.campus02.at/DE/Studieng%C3%A4nge/Informationstechnologien%20%20Wi5/Events/Code+Retreat.aspx) so we can buy enough food) 
 13:15-17:00 Coding Sessions (slight variations possible) 
 
Facilitator: Wolfgang Kaufmann (https://twitter.com/datentyp) 
Location: FH CAMPUS 02, Körblergasse 111, 8010 Graz, Austria
